description:
How to get people to like you in 60 seconds or less teaches you how to build rapport with people who you have just met for the first time in a social gathering using NLP techniques. This course will help you identify different types of people and how you can build and improve your relationship with them. It is very useful for people who are into sales . networking and marketing to identify potential clients and build a healthy relationship with them.

The techniques that will be covered in this course are-

  • Introduction to the course
  • How to build rapport with people
  • How to deal with different kinds of people
  • How to make people like you instantly using simple NLP techniques
  • How to make people like you instantly-advanced NLP techniques
  • Build rapport using anchoring techniques
  • Summary of the course
title: Learn how to get people to like you instantly
